Detailed Description

Abstract stateless interface for the Iterative Closest Point (ICP) registration algorithm.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void brics_3d::IIterativeClosestPoint::match ( PointCloud3D *  model,
PointCloud3D *  data,
IHomogeneousMatrix44 *  resultTransformation 
) [pure virtual]

Calculates the required transformation to align the data point cloud to the model point cloud.

Parameters:
[in]modelPointer to point cloud that represents the model
[in,out]dataPointer to point cloud that represents the data (points will be transformed during iterations)
[out]resultTransformationPointer to resulting homogeneous transformation to align both point clouds

NOTE: To apply an initial transformation ("initial guess") to one of the point clouds: invoke the homogeneous transformation directly on the point cloud data-type before starting the ICP registration. See also Point3D::homogeneousTransformation()

Implements brics_3d::IRegistration.

Implemented in brics_3d::IterativeClosestPoint.
